task.title: completing the labor condition application form
task.shortdesc: completing the labor condition application enables you to submit a calculated wage to the department of labor for certification and authorization to enable a foreign worker to be hired by a sponsoring company in the us

ul.li: you must have a predetermined wage level to input into the labor condition application based off of the foreign workers job description
you must have access to a registered account on the flag.dol.gov website

taskbody.context: the purpose of the labor condition application is to protect against financial exploitation of foreign workers while they are working in the us

step.cmd: use the sign in tab located on the home page to enter your registered account details
select form 9035 from the menu of avaliable forms to complete
select the type of specific type of petition you are completing for this labor condition application
step.stepxmp: a legal assistant would select h-1b from this menu if their labor condition application is for a h-1b petition

step.cmd: fill out the form by going through each section alphabetically with the wage range, wage level, and job description information for the foreign worker
navigate to the save and quit button and exit the form
step.info: it is only recommended to submit the form if a supervising attorney approves
